Foreword

Through my career there have been phases and roles that I have enjoyed the most. One of them was the training job I had in London. I saw I was making a difference to people's live, by helping them to find fullfilling jobs. I've gotten a lot of satisfaction from IT. And I think it's now payback time. I would like to share in a useful manner so that others can profit from my experiences.

Technologies explored

4 years

IT is a moving environment. If that bothers you, change of business. But trying to keep up with the latest novelty, is a very frustating exercise, as you never catch up. Or as long as you do, you are already behind.

However, if we identify the inherent patterns, then it gets eassier, as the patterns change much more slower that the technologies.

Languages

For this set of courses will touch the following technologies and framewoks. you should find useful ideas even if you don't know of them, and there will be, availble :

  • Web
    • HTML 5 (Hyperlink Tag Meta Language)
    • CSS3 (Cascading Style Sheets
    • React
    • Material Design
  • Database
    • MySQL
    • SQL (Structured Query Language)
    • JPA (Java Persistence API)
  • Programming Languages
    • Java J2EE
    • Spring & Spingboot
    • Cloud & DevOps
